gameutils
Class Sound

java.lang.Object
  gameutils.Sound

public class Sound
extends Object

A class that stores sound clips.

Author:
Roi Atalla

Nested Class Summary
 class Sound.Loader
          A convenience class that buffers Clips and loads them all at once.

Method Detail

getFileName

public static String getFileName(String file)
Returns the canonical name of this file path. It strips the path and the extension.

Parameters:
file - The file to be canonicalized.
Returns:
The canonical name of this file.

add

public Clip add(String file)
This method searches the root directory for the file path. Then it opens a Clip on the specified file. Its associated name is set as its canonical name.

Parameters:
file - The file to import.
Returns:
The Clip opened.

add

public Clip add(String file,
                String name)
This method searches the root directory for the file path. Then it opens a Clip on the specified file.

Parameters:
file - The file to import.
name - The name to associate with this Clip.
Returns:
The Clip opened.

add

public Clip add(URL url,
                String name)
Opens a Clip on this URL.

Parameters:
url - The URL of the sound file.
name - The name to associate with this Clip.
Returns:
The Clip opened.

add

public Clip add(Clip clip,
                String name)
Adds the Clip.

Parameters:
clip - The Clip to add.
name - The name to associate with this clip.
Returns:
The clip that was added.

getClip

public Clip getClip(String name)
Returns the Clip with the specified name.

Parameters:

Returns:
The Clip with the specified name.

rename

                   String newName)
Renames the Clip with the specified name.

Parameters:

newName - The new name.
Throws:
Exception

replace

public Clip replace(String oldName,
                    Clip newClip)
Replaces the Clip associated with the specified name with the specified Clip. Does the same thing as add(Clip,String)

Parameters:
oldName - The name of the old Clip.
newClip - The new Clip that will replace the old Clip.
Returns:
The Clip that was replaced.

swap

public void swap(String first,
                 String second)
Swaps the Clips of both specified names.

Parameters:
first - The first Clip.
second - The second Clip.

remove

public Clip remove(String name)
Removes the Clip.

Parameters:
name - The name of the Clip.
Returns:
The Clip that was removed.

play

public void play(String name)
Plays the Clip. If the sound is off, the volume is set to the minimum.

Parameters:
name - The name of the Clip to play.

loop

public void loop(String name)
Loops the Clip. If the sound is off, the volume is set to the minimum.

Parameters:
name - The name of the Clip to loop.

pause

public void pause()
Pauses all currently playing Clips.

resume

public void resume()
Plays all currently paused Clips.

pause

public void pause(String name)
Pauses the specified Clip.

Parameters:
name - The name of the Clip to pause.

stop

public void stop(String name)
Stops and resets the specified Clip.

Parameters:
name - The name of the Clip to stop.

setOn

public void setOn(boolean isOn)
Sets the sound on/off.

Parameters:
isOn - If true, all currently playing Clips are set to the minimum volume, else they are set to default volume.

isOn

public boolean isOn()
Returns whether the sound is on/off.

Returns:
True if the sound is on, else the sound is off.
